SummaryEnglish: Kurt Rockhans is a kind-hearted errand boy for a hero’s party, the Flaming Dragon Fang. One day, he’s banished from the party and finds out he has the lowest rank in combat. In order to make a living, Kurt picks up various jobs and discovers he has astonishing abilities. Though he doesn’t realize it yet, Kurt has SSS-rank skills in anything other than fighting, as he sets off on a new journey.
Aliases: Kanchigai no Atelier Meister Eiyuu Party no Moto Zatsuyougakari ga, Jitsu wa Sentou Igai ga SSS Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi
Kanchigai no Atelier Meister ~ Eiyuu Party no Moto Zatsuyougakari ga, Jitsu wa Sentou Igai ga SSS Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi
Kanchigai no Atelier Meister: Eiyuu Party no Moto Zatsuyougakari ga, Jitsu wa Sentou Igai ga SSS Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi
The Unaware Atelier Master: A common story about a former errand boy for a hero party who was actually SSS-ranked in everything except combat

1.TitleEnglish: The Guy In Charge of Chores With Low Self-Esteem Turned Out to Actually Possess Incredible Skills
1.SummaryEnglish: After he's fired from his party of heroes, the 15-year-old Kurt turns to a temp agency for work.

2.SummaryEnglish: Kurt accepts an offer from Bandana to go work at his first Atelier, which harbors a dangerous secret.

3.SummaryEnglish: While Ophelia and the others discuss plans to uncover who cursed Liselotte, Kurt takes a job as a porter.

4.TitleEnglish: New Friends in a New Atelier
4.SummaryEnglish: Yulishia establishes a new atelier in the frontier town without letting Kurt know he's its atelier meister.

5.TitleEnglish: A Frontier Town With Enemies at All Sides
5.SummaryEnglish: Tristan & a demon lord force Marlefiss to summon hordes of monsters to attack the town in order to kill Lise.

6.SummaryEnglish: Kurt tunnels into the ruins from underground and saves Marlefiss while his allies defeat the demon lord.

7.TitleEnglish: The New Papa of a Mysterious Egg
7.SummaryEnglish: After helping a village with a water shortage, Kurt receives an egg that hatches into a 3-year old girl.

8.SummaryEnglish: While Kurt and Yulishia help a farm with their pigs, a demon tries to take away Akuri.

9.SummaryEnglish: Mimico reports on Akuri and interrogates Solflare. Then Kurt & Lise go on a date before the rescue mission.

10.SummaryEnglish: Yulishia's date with Kurt is ruined when thugs harass a local meat bun shop over a cooking competition.

11.SummaryEnglish: While the group distracts the Margrave, Akuri warps Kurt into the forbidden room hiding the Margrave's secret.

12.TitleEnglish: A Common Story About How the Former Head of Chores for a Party of Heroes Was Actually SSS-Rank in All Except Combat Skills
12.SummaryEnglish: The Margrave tries to summon a demon to save his daughter. After he fails, the mastermind summons it anyway.
